page.title: 18BARNSTON SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: {Football and netball}are the two principal sports in the school.We have matches against other schools. The third and fourth year Junior boys have football team practices each Thursday after school. There are two netball teams A and B. A is the most advanced.The third and fourth year girls also have team practices after school on a Thursday. In addition we do{indoor hockey, {rounders (four different kinds),races, {cricket}and{table tennis. Each July we are split into four different teams for{Sportsday,}red yellow green and blue.Then each class does three races,the obstacle,the flat and the relay.At the end all the scores are added up to see which team has won.
